name: Node
description: An object with an ID to support global identification.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

name: HasMetafields
description: Represents information about the metafields associated to the specified resource.

fields.name: metafield
fields.description: The metafield associated with the resource.

args.name: namespace
args.description: Container for a set of metafields (maximum of 20 characters).

args.name: key
args.description: Identifier for the metafield (maximum of 30 characters).

fields.name: metafields
fields.description: A paginated list of metafields associated with the resource.

args.name: namespace
args.description: Finds all metafields with a specific namespace under the resource.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: privateMetafield
fields.description: Returns a private metafield found by namespace and key.

args.name: namespace
args.description: The namespace for the private metafield.

args.name: key
args.description: The key for the private metafield.

fields.name: privateMetafields
fields.description: List of private metafields.

args.name: namespace
args.description: Filter the private metafields by namespace.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

name: LegacyInteroperability
description: Interoperability metadata for types which directly correspond to a REST Admin API resource.

fields.name: legacyResourceId
fields.description: The ID of the corresponding resource in the REST Admin API.

name: DisplayableError
description: Represents an error in the input of a mutation.

fields.name: field
fields.description: Path to the input field which caused the error.

fields.name: message
fields.description: The error message.

name: HasPublishedTranslations
description: Published translations associated with the resource.

fields.name: translations
fields.description: The translations associated with the resource.

args.name: locale
args.description: Filters translations locale.

name: Publishable
description:
Represents a resource that can be published to a channel.
A publishable resource can be either a Product or Collection.

fields.name: availablePublicationCount
fields.description: The number of publications a resource is published to without feedback errors.

fields.name: publicationCount
fields.description: The number of publications a resource is published on.

args.name: onlyPublished
args.description: Include only the resource's publications that are published. If false, then return all the resource's publications including future publications.

fields.name: publishedOnChannel
fields.description: Check to see whether the resource is published to a given channel.

args.name: channelId
args.description: The ID of the channel to check.

fields.name: publishedOnCurrentChannel
fields.description: Check to see whether the resource is published to the calling app's channel.

fields.name: publishedOnCurrentPublication
fields.description: Check to see whether the resource is published to the calling app's publication.

fields.name: publishedOnPublication
fields.description: Check to see whether the resource is published to a given publication.

args.name: publicationId
args.description: The ID of the publication to check.

fields.name: resourcePublications
fields.description: The list of resources that are published to a publication.

args.name: onlyPublished
args.description: Return only the resources that are published. If false, then return all resource publications.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: unpublishedChannels
fields.description: The list of channels that the resource is not published to.

args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: after

args.name: last

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

fields.name: unpublishedPublications
fields.description: The list of publications that the resource is not published to.

name: Navigable
description:
A default cursor for use in pagination.
The default cursor can be used for next and previous navigation.

fields.name: defaultCursor
fields.description: A default cursor for use in pagination.

name: OnlineStorePreviewable
description: Online Store preview URL of the object.

fields.name: onlineStorePreviewUrl
fields.description: The online store preview URL.

name: AppPurchase
description: Services and features purchased once by the store.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the app purchase was created.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the app purchase.

fields.name: price
fields.description: The amount to be charged to the store for the app purchase.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the app purchase. Possible values include pending, active, declined and cancelled.

fields.name: test
fields.description: Whether the app purchase is a test transaction.

name: CommentEventSubject
description: The subject line of a comment event.

fields.name: hasTimelineComment
fields.description: Whether the timeline subject has a timeline comment. If true, then a timeline comment exists.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

name: HasEvents
description: Connector to event records on a compatible host.

fields.name: events
fields.description: The paginated list of events associated with the host subject.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns up to the first `n` elements from the list.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements that come after the specified cursor.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns up to the last `n` elements from the list.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements that come before the specified cursor.

args.name: reverse
args.description: Reverse the order of the underlying list.

args.name: sortKey
args.description: Sort the underlying list by the given key.

args.name: query
args.description:
Supported filter parameters:
 - `comments`
 - `created_at`
 - `subject_type`
 - `verb`

See the detailed [search syntax](https://help.shopify.com/api/getting-started/search-syntax).

name: Event
description:
Events chronicle resource activities such as the creation of an article, the fulfillment of an order, or the
addition of a product.

fields.name: appTitle
fields.description: The name of the app that created the event. Returns null when the event originates from the Shopify admin.

fields.name: attributeToApp
fields.description: Whether the event was created by an app.

fields.name: attributeToUser
fields.description: Whether the event was caused by an admin user.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the event was created.

fields.name: criticalAlert
fields.description: Whether the event is critical.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: message
fields.description: Human readable text that describes the event.

name: CustomerMoment
description: Represents events preceding a customer order, such as shop sessions.

fields.name: occurredAt
fields.description: When the customer moment occurred.

name: DiscountApplication
description:
Discount applications capture the intentions of a discount source at
the time of application on an order's line items or shipping lines.

fields.name: allocationMethod
fields.description: The method by which the discount's value is allocated to its entitled items.

fields.name: index
fields.description:
An ordered index that can be used to identify the discount application and indicate the precedence
of the discount application for calculations.

fields.name: targetSelection
fields.description: How the discount amount is distributed on the discounted lines.

fields.name: targetType
fields.description: Whether the discount is applied on line items or shipping lines.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the discount application.

name: ShopifyPaymentsChargeStatementDescriptor
description: The charge descriptors for a payments account.

fields.name: default
fields.description: The default charge statement descriptor.

fields.name: prefix
fields.description: The prefix of the statement descriptor.
